alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Howard (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:19AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Howard and northeastern Chickasaw Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 519 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elma, or 15 miles west of Cresco, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jerico around 540 AM CDT. Protivin around 555 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lylahs Marsh County Park, County Roads V 56 And B 33, Maple Leaf, Alta Vista, Saude, Lourdes, Highway 63 And County B 22, Little Turkey, Jacksonville and Schley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
